meta.title: GOLATUQUE - Official Transport of La Tuque
meta.description: The #1 transport service in La Tuque. Taxi, Shuttle, Delivery. Available 24/7. Book now for fast and reliable service.

hero.subtitle: golatuque is neither an Uber nor a taxi. It is a professional, simple, and safe human transport service.
hero.promise: « Text us or call us. Book or not. If we are available, we will pick you up. »

calculator.title: Estimate your trip
calculator.error_loc: Please select addresses from the list.
calculator.disclaimer: *Estimated price for indication only. Varies by traffic/waiting.

pricing.title: Pricing Transparency
pricing.subtitle: Price depends mainly on distance and travel time.
pricing.note: * Indicative estimate. Competitive rates for La Tuque.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: A transport solution adapted to every need.

items.title: Personal Transport
items.desc: From point A to point B. Simple, fast, safe. For your appointments, shopping, and outings.

items.title: Worker Transport
items.desc: For construction sites, shifts, and teams. Reliable to arrive on time.

items.title: Small Delivery
items.desc: Pickup of restaurant orders, packages, documents, or urgent local errands.

items.title: Corporate Transport
items.desc: Solution for Hydro-Québec, mail carriers, and professional visitors. Simplified billing.

items.q: Is this a taxi or Uber?
items.a: No. golatuque is neither an Uber nor a taxi. It is a professionally authorized human transport service, managed locally in La Tuque.
Payment is made in person via Square. We accept debit, credit, and cash.
Yes. All our transports are performed by drivers holding authorized transport permits and required insurance.

footer.rights: © {year} golatuque. Professional human transport service in La Tuque.

sticky.sms_body: Hello golatuque! I would like to book a ride.
